title: "AI: The economic facts behind the technology dominating conversation across the UK"
excerpt: "In the UK there are currently 3,011 companies classified as AI companies by The Data City, of which 38% are based in London and 17% in the South East. This is unsurprising given that these two regions create the highest levels of economic activity in the computer programming and information service industry."
